* The exact role of the Fifth Military District and Military- Maritime District Headquarters
during these combat operations remains unclear. Operational Groups 1 , 2 , 4, and 5 may
have reported directly to the JNA General Staff rather than the military districts, probably
leaving the military districts in a logistic support role.
